snippet.title: Lost In Darkness | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
After nearly a year of development, we are proud to announce our newest game "Lost In Darkness", an action survival top-down shooter, taking place in the Moroccan Atlas Mountains in the winter of 1993.
A free Demo of the game will be available very soon, for all to try, so stay on the lookout for it.
Thank you to all our supporters for their feedback and encouragement.

WISHLIST NOW:
- https://store.steampowered.com/app/2216580/Lost_in_Darkness/

CONTACT US:
- https://www.instagram.com/outcastgamestudio/
- https://twitter.com/OutcastDigital1
